00017 INT8 RTPlayerDecideAction( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00018 {
00019       INT8 bAction=AI_ACTION_NONE;
00020 
00021       if (gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode)
00022       {
00023             bAction = DecideAutoBandage( pSoldier );
00024       }
00025       else
00026       {
00027             bAction = DecideAction( pSoldier );
00028       }
00029 
00030       #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00031             STR tempstr;
00032             sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"DecideAction: selected action %d, actionData %d\n\n",bAction,pSoldier->usActionData);
00033             DebugAI((STR) tempstr );
00034       #endif
00035 
00036       return(bAction);
00037 }

00039 INT8 RTDecideAction(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
00040 {
00041       if (CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pSoldier ) )
00042       {
00043             return( CreatureDecideAction( pSoldier ) );
00044       }
00045       else if (pSoldier->ubBodyType == CROW)
00046       {
00047             return( CrowDecideAction( pSoldier ) );
00048       }
00049       else if (pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum)
00050       {
00051             return( RTPlayerDecideAction( pSoldier ) );
00052       }
00053       else
00054       {
00055             // handle traversal
00056             if ( (pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE) && (gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags3 & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG3_HANDLE_DONE_TRAVERSAL ) )
00057             {
00058                   TriggerNPCWithGivenApproach( pSoldier->ubProfile, APPROACH_DONE_TRAVERSAL, FALSE );
00059                   gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags3 &= (~PROFILE_MISC_FLAG3_HANDLE_DONE_TRAVERSAL);
00060                   pSoldier->ubQuoteActionID = 0;
00061                   // wait a tiny bit
00062                   pSoldier->usActionData = 100;
00063                   return( AI_ACTION_WAIT );
00064             }
00065 
00066             return( DecideAction( pSoldier ) );
00067       }
00068 }
00069 
00070 UINT16 RealtimeDelay( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00071 {
00072       if ( PTR_CIV_OR_MILITIA && !(pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup == KINGPIN_CIV_GROUP ) )                 
00073       {
00074             return( (UINT16) REALTIME_CIV_AI_DELAY );
00075       }
00076       else if ( CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pSoldier ) && !( pSoldier->bHunting ) )
00077       {
00078             return( (UINT16) REALTIME_CREATURE_AI_DELAY );
00079       }
00080       else
00081       {
00082             
00083             if ( pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup == KINGPIN_CIV_GROUP )
00084             {
00085                   UINT8       ubRoom;
00086 
00087                   if ( InARoom( pSoldier->sGridNo, &ubRoom ) && IN_BROTHEL( ubRoom ) )
00088                   {
00089                         return( (UINT16) (REALTIME_AI_DELAY / 3) );
00090                   }
00091             }
00092 
00093             return( (UINT16) REALTIME_AI_DELAY );
00094       }
00095 
00096 }

00098 
00099 void RTHandleAI( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00100 {
00101 #ifdef AI_PROFILING
00102       INT32 iLoop;
00103 #endif
00104 
00105       if ((pSoldier->bAction != AI_ACTION_NONE) && pSoldier->bActionInProgress)
00106   {
00107             // if action should remain in progress
00108             if (ActionInProgress(pSoldier))
00109             {
00110                   #ifdef DEBUGBUSY
00111                         AINumMessage("Busy with action, skipping guy#",pSoldier->ubID);
00112                   #endif
00113                   // let it continue
00114                   return;
00115     }
00116       }
00117 
00118       // if man has nothing to do
00119       if (pSoldier->bAction == AI_ACTION_NONE)
00120       {
00121             if (pSoldier->bNextAction == AI_ACTION_NONE)
00122             {
00123                   // make sure this flag is turned off (it already should be!)
00124                   pSoldier->bActionInProgress = FALSE;
00125 
00126                   // truly nothing to do!
00127                   RefreshAI( pSoldier );
00128             }
00129 
00130             // Since we're NEVER going to "continue" along an old path at this point,
00131             // then it would be nice place to reinitialize "pathStored" flag for
00132             // insurance purposes.
00133             //
00134             // The "pathStored" variable controls whether it's necessary to call
00135             // findNewPath() after you've called NewDest(). Since the AI calls
00136             // findNewPath() itself, a speed gain can be obtained by avoiding
00137             // redundancy.
00138             //
00139             // The "normal" way for pathStored to be reset is inside
00140             // SetNewCourse() [which gets called after NewDest()].
00141             //
00142             // The only reason we would NEED to reinitialize it here is if I've
00143             // incorrectly set pathStored to TRUE in a process that doesn't end up
00144             // calling NewDest()
00145             pSoldier->bPathStored = FALSE;
00146 
00147             // decide on the next action
00148 #ifdef AI_PROFILING
00149             for (iLoop = 0; iLoop < 1000; iLoop++)
00150 #endif
00151             {
00152                   if (pSoldier->bNextAction != AI_ACTION_NONE)
00153                   {
00154                         if ( pSoldier->bNextAction == AI_ACTION_END_COWER_AND_MOVE )
00155                         {
00156                               if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_COWERING )
00157                               {
00158                                     pSoldier->bAction = AI_ACTION_STOP_COWERING;
00159                                     pSoldier->usActionData = ANIM_STAND;
00160                               }
00161                               else if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight < ANIM_STAND )
00162                               {
00163                                     // stand up!
00164                                     pSoldier->bAction = AI_ACTION_CHANGE_STANCE;
00165                                     pSoldier->usActionData = ANIM_STAND;
00166                               }
00167                               else
00168                               {
00169                                     pSoldier->bAction = AI_ACTION_NONE;
00170                               }
00171                               if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == pSoldier->usNextActionData )
00172                               {
00173                                     // no need to walk after this
00174                                     pSoldier->bNextAction = AI_ACTION_NONE;
00175                                     pSoldier->usNextActionData = NOWHERE;
00176                               }
00177                               else
00178                               {
00179                                     pSoldier->bNextAction = AI_ACTION_WALK;                     
00180                                     // leave next-action-data as is since that's where we want to go
00181                               }
00182                         }
00183                         else
00184                         {
00185                               // do the next thing we have to do...
00186                               pSoldier->bAction = pSoldier->bNextAction;
00187                               pSoldier->usActionData = pSoldier->usNextActionData;
00188                               pSoldier->bTargetLevel = pSoldier->bNextTargetLevel;
00189                               pSoldier->bNextAction = AI_ACTION_NONE;
00190                               pSoldier->usNextActionData = 0;
00191                               pSoldier->bNextTargetLevel = 0;
00192                         }
00193                         if (pSoldier->bAction == AI_ACTION_PICKUP_ITEM)
00194                         {
00195                               // the item pool index was stored in the special data field
00196                               pSoldier->uiPendingActionData1 = pSoldier->iNextActionSpecialData;
00197                         }
00198                   }
00199                   else if ( pSoldier->sAbsoluteFinalDestination != NOWHERE )
00200                   {
00201                         if ( ACTING_ON_SCHEDULE( pSoldier ) )
00202                         {
00203                               pSoldier->bAction = AI_ACTION_SCHEDULE_MOVE;
00204                         }
00205                         else
00206                         {
00207                               pSoldier->bAction = AI_ACTION_WALK;
00208                         }
00209                         pSoldier->usActionData = pSoldier->sAbsoluteFinalDestination;
00210                   }
00211                   else
00212                   {
00213                         if (!(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ENGAGED_IN_CONV))
00214                         {
00215                               pSoldier->bAction = RTDecideAction( pSoldier );
00216                         }
00217                   }
00218             }
00219             // if he chose to continue doing nothing
00220             if (pSoldier->bAction == AI_ACTION_NONE)
00221             {
00222                   #ifdef RECORDNET
00223                         fprintf(NetDebugFile,"\tMOVED BECOMING TRUE: Chose to do nothing, guynum %d\n",pSoldier->ubID);
00224                   #endif
00225 
00226                   // do a standard wait before doing anything else!
00227                   pSoldier->bAction = AI_ACTION_WAIT;
00228                   //if (PTR_CIVILIAN && pSoldier->bAlertStatus != STATUS_BLACK)
00229                   if ( PTR_CIV_OR_MILITIA && !(pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup == KINGPIN_CIV_GROUP ) )                 
00230                   {
00231                         pSoldier->usActionData = (UINT16) REALTIME_CIV_AI_DELAY;
00232                   }
00233                   else if ( CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pSoldier ) && !( pSoldier->bHunting ) )
00234                   {
00235                         pSoldier->usActionData = (UINT16) REALTIME_CREATURE_AI_DELAY;
00236                   }
00237                   else
00238                   {
00239                         pSoldier->usActionData = (UINT16) REALTIME_AI_DELAY;
00240                         if ( pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup == KINGPIN_CIV_GROUP )
00241                         {
00242                               UINT8       ubRoom;
00243 
00244                               if ( InARoom( pSoldier->sGridNo, &ubRoom ) && IN_BROTHEL( ubRoom ) )
00245                               {
00246                                     pSoldier->usActionData /= 3;
00247                               }
00248 
00249                         }
00250                   }
00251             }
00252             else if (pSoldier->bAction == AI_ACTION_ABSOLUTELY_NONE)
00253             {
00254                   pSoldier->bAction = AI_ACTION_NONE;
00255             }
00256 
00257   }
00258 
00259       // to get here, we MUST have an action selected, but not in progress...
00260       NPCDoesAct(pSoldier);
00261 
00262       // perform the chosen action
00263       pSoldier->bActionInProgress = ExecuteAction(pSoldier); // if started, mark us as busy
00264 }
